entry.message: [exception:XuleRuleSetError] Instance validation exception: The rule set to used could not be determined. Check that there is a rule set map at /Users/campbellpryde/Library/Application Support/Arelle/plugin/xule/rulesetMap.json and verify that there is an appropiate mapping for the filing., instance: ait-20161214.xml - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1527428/000158064217000024/ait-20161214.xml Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Users/arelle/hfdev/arelle/Validate.py", line 112, in validate File "/Users/arelle/hfdev/arelle/ValidateXbrl.py", line 520, in validate File "/Applications/Arelle.app/Contents/MacOS/plugin/xule/__init__.py", line 861, in xuleValidate runXule(_cntlr, _options, val.modelXbrl, xule_validator['map_name']) File "/Applications/Arelle.app/Contents/MacOS/plugin/xule/__init__.py", line 787, in runXule raise xr.XuleRuleSetError('The rule set to used could not be determined. Check that there is a rule set map at {} and verify that there is an appropiate mapping for the filing.'.format(xu.get_rule_set_map_file_name(cntlr, rule_set_map))) xule.XuleRuleSet.XuleRuleSetError: The rule set to used could not be determined.
